TextView.android:text: Can solving riddles improve brain function?

We can play with our brain in a smart way with \nthe help of riddles. When creating or interpreting riddles our brain exercise mental processes such as thinking, imagining and reciting.
While solving jigsaw puzzle our brain produces dopamine that is essential for learning. Riddles can trigger our brain to a number of neural connections with the intention to find solution for the question thrown on us.
Riddle’s first task is to make us “THINK”. As demonstrated by man, thinking is the top mental activity that brings information together and end up in a meaningful solution. So, it is obvious that solving riddles can improve brain function.
Also, Riddles develop interpersonal skills in kid by creating a chance to entertain one another in their friend’s circle.
